reviews.comments: great location in the old city, with lots of traditional Albanian hospitality!

The apartment is in the old town.  Joni's parents waited for me and made sure everything was fine.  The place is clean and Joni's mother made delicious breakfast by 7am so I can tour the city before catching the bus.  It was a nice experience.

If you’re expecting luxury accommodation in the perfect location you’ll be disappointed. It’s about a ten minute walk to the main tourist center thru the beautiful streets of Gjirokastër and it’s a humble home run by the host’s parents. (More like a traditional bed and breakfast.) That said we loved staying here because our hosts were so sweet and hospitable and we left with such warmth in our hearts and great memories. And while it’s a humble home, we were very comfortable here. Everything was clean, breakfast was great, WiFi was fast, our hosts did our laundry for us and cooked rice for us, we had privacy and they have a gorgeous garden with spectacular views over the valley and of the castle. If we came back to Gjirokastër, we’d definitely come back here. No hesitation.
All great!

Let me just sart by saying the plance is sooo much better than the photos. The beds were new, since they are always renovating and updating their place. The beds where new and confortable. We had a bathroom in the room which was sparking clean, and huge. You have a seperate enerance and you only share the kitchen. 
Even though the food is not included in the price and we were the only tourists there, the host cooked for us everyday and every meal. They are more than welcoming to people and kind. We had burek with cheese which is finger licking good traditional albanian food and don't even get me started in paçë (another traditional food). And they refused to get more money for the food.
It is 10 min from historical places and 15-20 min from the bus station so you need no car. 
I can not recomend the place enough and the hosts can not be desribed, but I think you can not find better people in the entire Gjirokaster. Will go there again without a doubt.

A great place to stay! Good location close to the city Center. Host was very responsive in communication. His parents who are at the property are very sweet. Super clean place. Loved that we had our own entrance which is like its own apartment. Would recommend.

Communication:
Quick & helpful via (Hidden by Airbnb) . A bit impersonal with just "Host" as name. First I thought it is a group of people, but it is the son living abroad. He gives a nice self made digital photo guide of the city too. 
He will ask you if you need something during your stay. 

The hosts (his parents) have only basic knowledge of English. They are very friendly, helpful and interested. So we made conversation with translating programs. I could taste their garden pomegranates. Thank you! 

Check-in:
The place is easy to find. Contrary to a lot of other airbnb contacts, here you just go to this house number, open the front door and walk down the stairs. There is always someone. Check-in was very flexible and I appreciated to check-in before the mentioned time. 

Apartment:
In this house the hosts are living and they have three apartments. The one on first floor has 2 beds, bath & kitchen. One on ground floor has a beautiful view, 2 beds, bath but no kitchen and the last one had 4 beds (2 rooms, a bit dark), bath and kitchen. The house has a garden and a terrace where you can sit nicely. 

The apartment I booked (first floor) was still occupied, but I got a similar one (last mentioned).
What I first was confused about I later understood: the kitchen is not standardly equipped with a cooking plate. I got a gas cooker for boiling water after asking. After the other guests left I got an electrical cooking plate and a water boiler. With this cooking was possible. 
The connection cables for TV where there the TV not. I did not ask for it. 
The room had a big heater. I just tested it: it works properly.
What was remarkable: all was very clean. I did not often experience this. 

Location:
The location is somehow between new city (1km) and old center (1km) which you reach over the typical stone hill roads. I would say it is a good location. 

Conclusion: This is a great clean place, nice location, good price. I recommend it and would come again
The room is quiet and clean.  The entrance is independent so you can keep your privacy.  An elderly couple kindly helped me during my stay.

I arrived at Gjirokaster by midnight bus at midnight, but it was really helpful because I checked in early in the morning. The host and his wife were very kind and helpful, and it was an enjoyable stay. Faleminderit.

Many thanks to the Host that he has responded us very quickly as we had less time to make a decision where to stay. The place is not very big but rather comfortable. And it has very good location, close to all main parts of the city. We could walk to the Castle by foot and other sightseeings. It was a good time spent there though (Hidden by Airbnb) maps couldn’t lead us to the house quickly because some streets were under construction(
I think it’s one of the best places where to stay is case to are seeking for a good value of price and comfort))
What a nice place! Clean, perfectly situated between new and old town and the mother of the host is a real angel! I enjoyed my stay there very much!
We had a lovely stay at Host's place! :)

Location is amazing. Host is great and very quick with responses. Amazing tips on the area and things to do. He helped us with our bus information and returning our rental car. Thanks so much for a great stay

My boyfriend and I had a great time at the guest house. The room was spacious for a cheap price, with a refridgerator and air conditioning. They have a garden with a nice view. 
The host was helpful and provided us with a lot of useful information.
Nice located in the old city center, verry friendly people
It was very beautiful place with lovely garden. Close to the old town and the castle. Thank you.
Great location around the old town, and very lovely host

Great place, everybody was very helpful and nice, and the host's quick and detailed answers and suggestions made our stay and travels much easier. The room is very clean, and has a nice location with a beautiful garden. We would absolutely recommend it.

I can confirm all the previous reviews, this was a fantastic place to stay . The apartment is in a traditional Albanian house that was very recently renovated and seems brand new as well as perfectly clean. We always had plenty of hot water. This is probably the best value accomodation in Gjirokaster.
Great place, good location, friendly guest - we could just recommend Lorenc and his family if you're looking for a nice place to stay at.
Very clean rooms. Communication with the host, whose parents run the guesthouse, was very good.
Nice place to stay
Easy to find (just look fo no.912 on the corresponding street), very clean apartment. Host also sent info about places to visit in the city. Thank You! :)
Great location and great recommendations

The place was very clean and very well located, also the host sent us a lot of interesting information about Gjirokastër. 
Just a few things : we hadn’t cooking basics even if we ask for them. You have hot water in the shower for no more than 2 minutes. And the indications to get to the place wasn’t good so we had to ask a lot of people to get to the place. 
The kindness of host’s mother will make you forget these few things and in general our staying was good. Thank you

I had a very pleasant stay in Garden Guest House. The room was quiet, clean and cozy. Hosts parents are very friendly and hospitality. I got a lot of helpful and interesting advices about Gjirokaster and a delicious breakfast every morning. I can highly recommend it.

This a hidden gem! Ideally located at the entrance of the old town, with an adorable patio overlooking the castle, clean self-contained unit; Joni & his mother are really helpful hosts, one gives you great tips to visit the city and the other cooks breakfast! Outstanding value! Thanks for all.
super breakfast and the host was very attentionned even if we were not speaking the same language ! I will recommended without hesitation

The rooms are clean, you have a lot of space, also u can stay in garden in the morning very beautiful view.the host are friendly. Its not difficult to find. for the value I paid its very good, I liked it.

The apartment is very well located close to the historic city center of Gjirokaster. We were warmly welcomed by Joni's parents who provided a tasty breakfast for us every morning. 
Any questions were answered in no time via (Hidden by Airbnb) . 
Thanks a lot. Big recommendation for a super economic price!
Very nice place with helpful tips how to get there and what to see in the city. Very friendly and helpful hosts! I recommend this accommodation especially for this price

Excellent experience! Really good value for the price, in a good location where I felt safe to move around during day and night. Also very good breakfast. The internet was very good and I could also connect via cable to work. Thank you guys!!

Easy to find, 10 minutes walk from the bus station, a very central location in the old city, I was there only one day but could easily make a complete sight seeing by walking. Friendly host and great hospitality, breakfast included. Accommodation is in an authentic Albanian house.
Very good host. we felt very welcome and the parents were helpful. good breakfast and very clean house. Thanks for all!

We totally love our stay in this Lovely guesthouse.. The host is really reactive, gives many indications for the buses, the places around, the restaurants. Their parents stay in the guesthouse and they are Amazing People, always ready to help.
The room is as described, really clean with à Lovely view on the castle, Just as the garden.
The morning breakfast is tasty, made of fruits and vegetables from the garden.
We totally recommand this place cheap, central, clean, a real local expérience.

The place is very nice, with a beautiful garden and not too far from the old center and the castle. We had a warm welcome from the hosts and they offered us a good homemade breakfast. I definitely recommend it.

This is the best Airbnb I've ever been. Their warmness and hospitality has no price at all... They really make you feel at home. And the rest of this are very correct too: clean, good location, good communication...the best choice in gjirokaster.

Amazing localisation! And in this city if you don't want to walk it's very steep street all day. We also did get a completly separate apartment from the family house. But I think that they have an other apartment in their propriety and I do not know about this second place. We did have a great stay in this very beautiful stone city
Stay was nice, especially for such a low price! We had good breakfast, and it was close to the old city center!

We got a very warm-hearted welcome and service during our stay. They paid much attention to our comfort.
The localisation of the guest house could not be better. Panorama is awesome, the main sights are in a 10-minute-long walk. It is silent and peaceful, yet close to the spark of the city. Ideal place for those who want to explore a really interesting and authentic Albanian city.

Wonderful place just a corner from the old town center. Quiet, yet close to everything. The owner gave us all the tips we should know about the city and the neighbourhood, which was very nice. Although I don't speak Albanian, I've had a great talk with his parents who really care about the place. Only one night, wish I've been more.
It was amazing experience. Owners doesnt speak english but their son do. Great family. I spend one night and in the morning it was like leaving my own family.

かなりきつくﾃﾞｺﾎﾞｺな坂を登るので､ｽｰﾂｹｰｽの場合はﾊﾞｽを使うことをお勧めします｡
おばあちゃんがとてもﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰで､ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄ後も快く荷物を預かってくれ､ｻﾞｸﾛまでくれました!
Logement convenable mais très insuffisant pour la cuisine et un éclairage triste.
Eine der phänomenalsten Airbnb Erfahrung ever. Die Hosts waren sehr nett, hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend. Alles war super sauber. Absolut empfehlenswert.

Notre séjour chez les parents de Host c'est très bien déroulé. Sa maman est aux petits soins pour chacun et malgré la barrière de la langue (elle ne parle pas anglais) ce fût un réel plaisir de rester avec elle pour visiter son jardin. Attention toutefois à ne pas oublier vos boules quies sous peine de réveil (très) matinal par le coq voisin.

Logements propres et fonctionnels avec une super vue sur Gjirokastër à 10 minutes en montant à pied vers le bazar. Excellente communication en amont avec envoi d’infos tres detaillees pour découvrir la ville. Sur place la famille ne parle qu’Albanais mais l’accueil souriant et cordial. permet de se comprendre pour l’essentiel. Un très bon rapport qualité prix. Seule observation: les chambres ne sont pas équipées d air conditionné comme referencé sur air b n b mais de ventilateur électrique avec fonction « cooler ».
ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ時にﾎｽﾄと4時間以上連絡が取れず道に迷っていたので大変でした(看板無し)!ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝも良いとは言い難いです(ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝに行くのに坂道を往復20分以上歩きます)｡それでも部屋は景色も良くて新しく清潔でした(冷房はありません･送風機有り)｡お世話してくれたご両親はとても素晴らしい方達でした!お勧めの宿です｡
Une adresse formidable pr séjourner et visiter La vieille ville .  Attention ! Pr garer sa voiture et trouver l’adresse , c’est assez sport .
Bardzo mili gospodarze, czysto i świetna lokalizacja
Nous avons été très bien accueillis. Le logement est propre et très bien situé. En prime, un excellent petit déjeuner.

El lugar está muy bien. Es limpio, amplio y está bien ubicado. El desayuno está muy bien también. La madre de Joni es muy amable si bien nos entendíamos por seña. 
El lugar es recomendable.
Solo dos cosas a tener en cuenta:
1) en los servicios dice qué hay cocina pero no hay (por lo menos mientras estuvimos nosotros) ni si quiera una pava eléctrica para calentar agua, había que pedirle a la madre que nos caliente en una hornalla con garrafa. Imposible cocinar algo.
2) el agua caliente del baño se acaba rápido, deben bañarse rápido o el segundo esperar a que vuelva a calentarse.

Alles bestens! Sehr saubere Zimmer, gute und ruhige Lage mit tollem Blick auf die Burg, perfekte Wegbeschreibung und Kommunikation vorab sowie problemloser, flexibler Check In. Die Gastgeber waren zudem total freundlich und sehr angenehm. Sehr zu empfehlen!

Es hat alles prima geklappt. Die Kommunikaton war top, es gab sogar noch gute Tipps zur Stadt und eine klasse Wegbeschreibung. Jeden Morgen eine super Leckeres Frühstück. Ich kann die Unterkunft bestens empfehlen

Très belle chambre à l’écart. Les parents de Host sont très attentifs à nos besoins et chaque matin, nous avons eu un copieux petit-déjeuner avec les produits de leur jardin. Host est resté en contact quasi permanent avec nous et nous a donné d’excellentes suggestions de visites depuis Prague où il fait ses études. Excellente adresse!

Świetne miejsce i lokalizacja, pyszne śniadanie i bardzo sympatyczni gospodarze 
Zdecydowanie polecam

L'alloggio ci è piaciuto molto, spazioso, pulito, con wi-fi in un bellissimo giardino in cui è presente un'altra abitazione dove vivono i genitori di chi ci ha ospitato. Anche se parlavano solo albanese siamo riusciti a capirci e ci hanno offerto una grande colazione. con prodotti freschi, probabilmente del loro orto. In ogni caso l'host è stato molto presente e disponibile con messaggi per ogni evenienza. La città è stupenda, un gioiellino da visitare in Albania. L'alloggio è abbastanza centrale con un po' di salite ma tutta la cittadina è così.

La casa ha un bellissimo giardino, e la colazione offerta è ottima ed abbondante. Tuttavia la sistemazione non corrisponde del tutto alle foto, anche se nella sostanza la casa era equivalente a quella mostrata nell'annuncio. L'host non era presente e la comunicazione con i genitori è stata difficile perché parlavano solo albanese.  Al momento del nostro pernottamento cucina, salotto e uno dei due bagni erano in condivisione con i genitori dell'host.
Nous avons passé un agréable séjour ici. Je recommande
Gut gelegen, ruhig, nette Gastgeber.

sectionedDescription.access: You will have your private room with bathroom. Free coffee, tea and drinking water is served at any time.
sectionedDescription.description:
Located in the UNESCO-protected city of Gjirokastër, in the region of Gjirokastër, Albania, Guest House Garden is just 700 meters away from the old city center and about 900 meters from the Castle, the symbol of the City. The property is located 35.5 Kms away from the splendid beach of Ksamil, about 220 Kms from Tirana, the capital of Albania, and 90 Kms from Ioannina, Greece.

This is a private house with many rooms. It features a nice courtyard full of greenness and a panoramic view of the castle. Every room is equipped with AC, TV and Wifi. The rooms come with a private bathroom and shower.

You will have your private room with bathroom. Free coffee, tea and drinking water is served at any time.

My parents will help you with anything you might need. I will also contact you and send you a slideshow with history and pictures of the city. You can use it to find out the best sites to visit.

Our neighborhood is full of private houses that do usually have gardens. It is very calm and peaceful. The view of the castle and the upper part of the city is wonderful.

There is a free parking space in the nearby street.
sectionedDescription.interaction: My parents will help you with anything you might need. I will also contact you and send you a slideshow with history and pictures of the city. You can use it to find out the best sites to visit.

The property is located 35.5 Kms away from the splendid beach of Ksamil, about 220 Kms from Tirana, the capital of Albania, and 90 Kms from Ioannina, Greece.

reviews.comments: Lovely place with a spectacular view.  Much better than I was expecting.  Meti is a perfect host.
Large space, very friendly and helpful hosts, convenient location. Thanks for the stay!
Great place with awesome views! Meti was always helpful and responsive, thanks!
We enjoyed Meti's hospitality and place as well as his valuable local tips. We, therefore, recommend them to future travelers. Our best regards and wishes to you Meti!

This is a modern, well-furnished apartment with a comfortable bed in a great location.  It’s walking distance to anywhere in Sarandë and the street is easy to drive in and out of and to find free parking.  The sea view from the balcony is fabulous.

Meti is a kind and considerate host and was there to help us when we initially had trouble locating the apartment building.  We also felt very comfortable knowing he was located in the same building should we need anything.
Excellent location, good apartment. Amazing view to city.
Totul a fost super

it is charming here!

reviews.comments: Excellent apartment and absolutely superior management. Mona takes care of everything, and in addition makes certain you have good healthy breakfast. Everything is sparkling clean and made comfortable and convenient. Mona is not only a perfect host, but a very kind and enlightened soul, her presence is healing. Best place to transit in Saranda!
Enea and his mum are wonderful people, always available and caring! The place is nice and proper and in the middle of everything!
Enea è molto gentile e disponibile, sua mamma prepara per ogni ospite una ricca colazione ogni mattina. La stanza ed il bagno sono molto puliti e ben organizzati.

highlights.message: This is one of a few places in the area that has this feature.
highlights.headline: Breakfast

reviews.comments: A beautiful campground with outstanding amenities and wonderful hosts. You can rent sleeping bags/pads/ tent/ and pillow as well as get a very nice breakfast. They also have beers and water, and nice shower and toilet and sink. Really a much better place than what I would expect for the remote location, certainly the best choice of lodging in Permet for anyone who doesn't mind camping.

I came to Permet to enjoy some nature activities, and that is exactly what I got. Robert was a great climbing instructor and Dona made delicious local food every day. The Eco Bar is a great place to meet local people and other travelers.

I came as a stranger and left as a friend :)

Of all the places in Albania we stayed, this was the best. Dona and Robert are kind, and good people. We didn’t have sleeping bags or a tent so they gave us a van with a matrass and sleeping bags! The nature is great and they will give you great ideas to visit. The bar has everything you need, the food is delicious and the facilities are really clean. They have a dog, donkey, sheep and a cat that like to visit you all day long. Dona and Robert showed us the true kindness of Albanian people.

If you book here: Call them! Their internet is really slow but they speak and understand English well. Also, book or call them through (Hidden by Airbnb) , since Airbnb takes more than 80% of the earnings they get. They deserve better!

Our stay was really amazing! My 2 friends and I loved every second :) they were so kind and lovely! We could sleep in a van and Donna gave us some sheets :) the breakfasts was also delecious and local. The rafting experience is also something you should book, we had so much fun!! Thank you Robert and Donna and we hope to see you soon xxx
Perfect quiet place!

its a very nice little camping by a lovely couple, who have animals and a sheep that acts like a dog. Its nice to stay in their nature campsite where there is no internet, but lovely surroundings of the mountains and you can sleep in a tent.
If you do want some luxiry they also have an omd van with a comfortable matress in it, and if you let the doors open a smooth breeze cools you off at night.

Also: just contact them on this site, don’t book, because its more expensive on air bnb then if you pay at their site.
Dona was alittle embarresed that I payed more (couldnt cancel because cost even more if tou dont do it 24h in advance), so she made me a super nice breakfast in the morning!!

They are wonderful people, Robert can take you rafting as well, and the thermal baths are close and great ro do as a trip!

The owners Dona and Robert are caring people. I did rafting with Robert and he is a trustworthy and competent guide. He also recommended to me nice hiking tours for day trips in the area. I came without a tent, but could get one (without additional costs). The breakfast is huge.
The camping spot is not very modern, but it is clean and has lots of soul and heart! At some evenings we cooked together. I enjoyed my stay and will come again one day!

Place is in the nature, so do not expect everything as in town. There is a shower and wc. In the night it can be noisy, dogs will bark, some insect will bite you, but that's the way it should be at the country side. We did not talk to Robert, but can say all the best about Dona. Most warm hearted person in our trip.  :))
This ecocamping is an amazing, quite place; the love of animals and nature, the hospitality of Dona and Robert, the possibility for rafting, hiking,.. It was a fantastic experience, love this people!

What a place. From moment one this felt like coming home, thanks to Dona and Robert, their lovely animals and the overwhelming splendor and power of silence and nature. They do everything they can to see you leave with a happy feeling, in such a spontaneous, pure way. It is a simple campsite, where small steps change small things, one that is permeated by love and enthusiasm for everything that has to do with nature, people, recycling, ... It was a beautiful experience, thank you so much.
Very nice camping site with very friendly hosts! Recommendable!

Nice camp ground with a good spirit  in the beautiful Viosa valley. We got a warm welcome. We had our own tent but camping equipment is also available on site. The thermal springs are just 15 min away.

The people: Robert and Donna who run the camping are lovely people. Robert has his own adventure company and does rafting tours mainly while Donna is the hostess.

They have 1 sheep named Simon who more behaves like a dog, as he is friends with the one dog this couple has.

The camping is very basic but the atmosphere and location are great. 

I would definately go again if i had the option.

It's was an amazing moment !
The camp is really beautiful, it's very quiet, very peaceful ! The host Robert and Donia are very adorable and  they do the best for all kind we ask ! It was too nice !
Thanks for all !

Our stay was wonderful! The host where so kind and nice and they maked sure we had the best possible stay. The facilities where all basic but everything what you need!  Together with the amazing surrounding views it was a perfect stay. Highly recommended!

I love this place. Robert and Dona are beautiful people. The location are so rustic cause the camp is in itinere, but i love it because are natural and easy. If you haven't any pretension and you like the semplicity this is your location.
Super liebe und sehr hilfsbereite Campingplatz Besitzer die das ganze mit ganz viel Liebe betreiben. Wir haben uns sehr willkommen gefühlt.

Nous avons passé une très bonne nuit dans une tente prêtée et montée par notre hôte Dona, en pleine nature. Dona à été aux petits soins, le petit déj était extra et copieux, n'hésitez pas pour une pause au vert proche de Permët!

Si vous souhaitez vivre une expérience authentique et unique dans la nature Albanaise au sein d’un petit coin de paradis, n’hésitez pas à vous rendre au camping de Robert et Dona ! Robert propose des activités de rafting et Dona, en plus de passer du temps à partager et échanger avec ses hôtes, vous cuisine des bons petits plats traditionnels ! Ses amoureux de la nature et des animaux sont véritablement des hôtes en or!

primaryHost.about:
I’m passioned about nature -rafting, hiking, tracking, canyoning, climbing-, and for all these things I’m a guide! I really love the mountains so I spend a large part of my life in it to enjoy wild woods, waters and the silence of nature. 

It’s been ten years I’m a rafting guide. I have worked with many tourist  all over the world and I offer any kind of experience in nature around Përmet in any season. Together with my wife, Dona, I run the EcoCamping at the km 3 on the street from Permet to Korce (SH75), near the Vjosa river, our rafting paradise! 

You can find us at "Polimen" Km3, Rruga Përmet - Korçë. Come here and ask me for any kind of info!
primaryHost.name: Robert

sectionedDescription.description:
We are a little, quite EcoCamping for those people who want to feel closer to nature. We can offer you a beautiful view, a river, friendly (and funny) animals, local drinks and food and a lot of relaxing and adventurous activities in the area, such as rafting, hiking, climbing, canyoning and more. 

We are waiting for you in the street from Përmet to Korce (SH75) at km 3!

Our camping is available for any kind of campers: you choose your own spot with your tent, car or camper or you can sleep in our little van,  in our tent(s) with mattress and sleeping bag.  

But if you want to enjoy a real nature feeling -stars and animals- than a hammock is may be your best sleepingfriend :-)

My wife, Dona, likes to meet and greet people. She will give you information about the camping (like our lovely dog Trixi likes shoes), about the activities in the area of Përmet, places where you can eat and you can have a (little) talk in our Eco Bar!

Our campsite is surrounded by mountains and a national park, grapefruit and grass for our sheep. After 5 minutes walking, you come to Vjosa river: the last natural one in Albania and the biggest one in Europe without dams. It’s a paradise for nature lovers, swimmers, rafters, fishermen, hikers,... 

In 10 km you find the Benje therms (hot springs) and the Kadiu bridge. Walk next (or into) the river and explorer the wonderful canyon - an activity we also offer with me as your guide. 

Visit the old city Gjirokaster and it’s castle, go to Korça or just enjoy our little village, Përmet, where in the morning and evening you will feel a very local atmosphere. 

Welcome, be our guest :-)
sectionedDescription.interaction: My wife, Dona, likes to meet and greet people. She will give you information about the camping (like our lovely dog Trixi likes shoes), about the activities in the area of Përmet, places where you can eat and you can have a (little) talk in our Eco Bar!
sectionedDescription.name: Albturist Eco Camping Permet
sectionedDescription.neighborhoodOverview:
Our campsite is surrounded by mountains and a national park, grapefruit and grass for our sheep. After 5 minutes walking, you come to Vjosa river: the last natural one in Albania and the biggest one in Europe without dams. It’s a paradise for nature lovers, swimmers, rafters, fishermen, hikers,... 

In 10 km you find the Benje therms (hot springs) and the Kadiu bridge. Walk next (or into) the river and explorer the wonderful canyon - an activity we also offer with me as your guide. 

Visit the old city Gjirokaster and it’s castle, go to Korça or just enjoy our little village, Përmet, where in the morning and evening you will feel a very local atmosphere. 

Welcome, be our guest :-)

But if you want to enjoy a real nature feeling -stars and animals- than a hammock is may be your best sleepingfriend :-)

We are waiting for you in the street from Përmet to Korce (SH75) at km 3!

sectionedDescription.description:
Toli’s Camping offers space for 30 tents with caravans welcome. Bar, restaurant & private beach are available to our guests with live music (guitar) on weekends. Pets and children welcome!

The base price for guests with their own tent is €7 per person. Those wishing to use the camps own tents is €9. Additional extras include €2 euros for electricity and €3 for use of the washing machine. Guests are welcome to park cars/caravans on-site for €5. Alternatively we also offer parking outside and directly next to the campsite.

reviews.comments: Evi's team was superbly hospitable and offered pick up and drop from the bus station even at 6am!

Our stay at Evi's hostel was great. Although we only stayed 1 night, the Professor, Robert, was very thoughtful and attentive and gave us great local tips. His family is very friendly and it was great to hear about the history Gjirokaster. He has a great vision for growing tourism in the city.
Very nice place for visiting Gijrokaster
reviews.response: Very nice, quiet and pleasant people. Left the place clean and in order. Happy to have them!

reviews.comments:
Really confortable appartement with all you need. Communication was great and they came to pick us up at te bus station. Robert was really nice and aware person and suggest some trips to do around ! He was good help to organize the trip to Sarandë. 
Only one thing the apartment is a lit bit far away from the center so I would recommend to come back by taxi at night.
Thank you Robert and good luck for the future :)

Excellent place! Nice, clean, quiet place. Brand new beds, mattresses, pillows, lines and everything! The host was very helpful in anything. Very easy to find and lots of parking. Would definitely come back!
Ambiente muito agradável. Bonito e funcional. Vale a pena. A relação preço benefício é excelente. Recomendo
Evi a été très agréable, il nous a donné de bons conseils et son logement était parfait pour une nuit !

There is also a nice garden on the outside part of the house with vineyards, and a fantastic sightseeing of the mountains and the old city

Guest have access to the garden, parking, living room, kitchen, bathroom, hallway, lockers area....

sectionedDescription.description: The apartment is located uphill in the greatest part of Vlora, "Uji i Ftohte" neighborhood. It takes only few minutes walk to reach the beach area (not more than 200 m uphill) as well as the fancy restaurants, bars and best pubs of the "Vlora Lungomare". primaryHost.about: Hey I am Arbri and I am a local of Saranda. I work  at the Civil Hospital of Saranda . I am a laid-back person , fridenly and I like walking.
primaryHost.name: Arbri

sectionedDescription.access:
You can use your room and the shared space. I have my own room.
You can access the kitchen whenever you want to cook.
sectionedDescription.description:
By booking my place you get a PRIVATE ROOM for two and a shared bathroom and living room. Here it's a quite place so you can enjoy the distance from the caotic  center of Saranda. You have a table and chairs in the balcony for enjoyinv the spectacular view. The max of people that will be here is 3. The surface of all the flat is 100meters square.

A decored bathroom, a warm kitchen that goes directly to the living room, which itself is connected to the balcony with to big doors.

You can use your room and the shared space. I have my own room.
You can access the kitchen whenever you want to cook.

You can text to Anisa(my wife) or me. If I am at the house I will be happy to share with you information about the best places to eat and visit in the area.

Fantastic blue view.  And not densed population. You can go outside of Saranda really fast and come home fast by the fifth road(no traffic). 

Walking down the street to the beach is 15mins and coming up is 20-25mins.  You have minimarket 2mins away and the best restaurants 10-20min away.

Its easy to come by car. I will give you coordinates. 

If you come by public transport you will have to walk 20mins till here. 

Going to the Port is 15min away amd coming from the Port is 20min.

Going to the bus station for Butrint is 20mins.

It's not suggested for old ages or people with CHF or cardiac problems.

name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: Had a wonderful stay. The tent was cool considering it was August! Slept very well. They were the friendliest and most welcoming family. If we come back would stay again

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: Convenient location right across from beach! Close to shops and restaurants. Very comfortable tent! Very nice and cool at night. A bit loud as other tents are close. All facilities are very clean but there is a bit too much rubbish around the perimeter of the campsite. This is a shame as overall it’s a great stay with  helpful hosts.

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments:
This place is really nice and for its price definitely recommendable. The tents are big comfy. Sometimes at night I found it a bit noisy cause of some fellow travelers who were talking loud, but that's not something the owner can do about and its also kind of normal on a camping. The tent doesn't have any mesh (see though tent net), which is the only bummer cause otherwise you could open your tent and still leave the muscitos out. But actually we slept fine without muscitos by leaving the tent closed. It was not so warm due to the shadow created by the roof over the tent.
WiFi is available through the restaurant next to camping. The owner even put the Ajax match on for me to watch football with the men there, which was cool and fun.

Nice people!

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: Great stay and good food

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: Nice tants but you can’t totally close them, hence allowing insects to come in, besides the bathroom was dirty, but it has a very good location and it’s good enough for the value, very cheap!

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: No wi-fi but good value.

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: Very cheap, and very close to the beach. Incredibly nice and helpful staff. Quiet and calm. The bathroom didn't have  water when we were there, but it seemed temporary.

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: The family who runs the place is lovely !! I had a great time . For me the best was the location in front of beach ! But it’s not clean,  there is only one toilet and not WiFi . But it’s cheap.

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: Nice and quite place, with extraordinary people...

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments:
First we would stay just foe 1 might, but after our arrival we decided to take another night. The tents are located behind a bar/restaurant, where we were friendly and helpfull welcomed by the staff.
The place is right at the beach and in the middle of different bars and restaurant. Unfortunatly we didnt met Miranda herself, but she was easy reachable by phone. The staff from the bar/restaurant were allways in the neighbourhood to help and advice. Thanks for everythong!

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments:
We recommend Miranda and the people at the bar for hosting. 
The communication with Miranda went through phone, everything we needed was in reach. The people at the bar were very friendly and helpful. 
The location was perfect for us, just across the street there is the beach. 
The tents were fun, and because of the extra rooftop above them they don't became hot early in the morning. 

Would love to return someday!

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: Emplacement parfait, juste en face de la mer, tente confortable et très bon accueil. Très bon rapport qualité prix.

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: "Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea" è la descrizione ideale per questo posto. Tende grandi a disposizione degli ospiti con materassino lenzuola e cuscino a pochi passi dal mare e da ristorantini e bar. Miranda è stata molto gentile nelle comunicazioni e anche il ragazzo che ci ha accolti lì. Abbiamo avuto solo un po' di problemi a trovare il posto perché avevo perso le indicazioni della pagina e il navigatore non ci segnalava l'indirizzo e non avevo capito fosse all'interno di un bar. Per il resto tutto bene, unica pecca è che l'acqua della doccia è fredda.

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments:
Tente pratique et très proche de la mer
Mais pas de wifi

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.comments: Die Angaben im inserat sind leider nicht alle korrekt. Es gab kein WLAN, keine Handtücher und nur eine Dusche und ein Waschbecken. Diese und die Toiletten waren ziemlich schmutzig. Die zelte sind ganz komfortabel. Jedoch konnte man sie nicht ganz schließen sodass nachts eine Maus in unser Zelt kam. Man muss das Loch am besten mit einem Handtuch ausstopfen. Das Personal war freundlich.

listing.name: Tranquil tents a few meters from the sea

reviews.response:
We always had positive reviews. It happened that you made the booking on the date of the opening of the tents. There was not much time for settlements. Anyway, we ask you to forgive.
All the best

primaryHost.about:
Me and my husband have been running this business for many years now, and we enjoy it very much. 
We like to rent and host, cause we think this is the only way you can get the real taste of the place you're visiting, get some tips from locals and make some new friends around the world!! 
Our greatest memories have been not only those of exploring beautiful panoramas and landscapes but getting to know the culture, enjoying culinary and exploring hidden places, tips which can only be given by locals. 
Cheers!!
primaryHost.name: Miranda

sectionedDescription.description:
Nice and cozy tends

Dear guest,
Thank you for your reservation. We are delighted to host you for this period. The meeting point to come at our place is at Rruga e Plazhit, Borsh. In case you do not know the area, below we will give you a short guide from the national road:
At the national road you have to turn at the gas station, when you will see the road sign named "BORSH". You will drive (or walk) in a straight road (approx. 2-3 km) with olive trees on your both sides. Drive till the end of the road until you'll see the sea and then turn on your left side. Drive for another 2 km. The tents are placed in the backyard of a Creperie, which is approx. 250 meters before arriving at a big hotel called Blue Days Borsh. In case you can still not find it, please feel free to contact us and we will help to pick you up.
When are you planning to arrive?
How many guests are you?
Please contact us at least 2 hours before your arrival at the mobile number +355686089547 You can give us a call from the taxi/bus driver number (if you are coming by taxi or bus), in case you cannot call Albanian numbers.
sectionedDescription.interaction:
Dear guest,
Thank you for your reservation. We are delighted to host you for this period. The meeting point to come at our place is at Rruga e Plazhit, Borsh. In case you do not know the area, below we will give you a short guide from the national road:
At the national road you have to turn at the gas station, when you will see the road sign named "BORSH". You will drive (or walk) in a straight road (approx. 2-3 km) with olive trees on your both sides. Drive till the end of the road until you'll see the sea and then turn on your left side. Drive for another 2 km. The tents are placed in the backyard of a Creperie, which is approx. 250 meters before arriving at a big hotel called Blue Days Borsh. In case you can still not find it, please feel free to contact us and we will help to pick you up.
When are you planning to arrive?
How many guests are you?
Please contact us at least 2 hours before your arrival at the mobile number +355686089547 You can give us a call from the taxi/bus driver number (if you are coming by taxi or bus), in case you cannot call Albanian numbers.
